Subsection.title: Description
Subsection.Paragraph: aurantium audio map files must end with exactly one End section, which has the identifier 0x4155524D454E4421 and must be of size 0.
End sections are encoded as follows:
There should be no trailing data in the audio map file after the End section.

Subsection.title: Cardinality
Subsection.Paragraph: An End section must appear in a aurantium audio map file exactly once, and must be the last section present in the file.
